\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq2.1} 
{\bf \Gamma}&\rightarrow&e^{i\Lambda({\bf X})}{\bf \Gamma},\nonumber \\
T({\bf X})&\rightarrow& e^{i\Lambda({\bf X})}T({\bf X}),\nonumber \\
A^{(-)}_{\mu}({\bf X})&\rightarrow& A^{(-)}_{\mu}({\bf X})
+\partial_{\mu}\Lambda({\bf X}),\nonumber \\
A^{(+)}_{\mu}({\bf X})&\rightarrow& A^{(+)}_{\mu}({\bf X})
+\partial_{\mu}\Lambda^{\prime}({\bf X}).
\

A_{\mu}({\bf X})&\rightarrow& A_{\mu}({\bf X})
+\partial_{\mu}\Lambda({\bf X}).

\begin{eqnarray}
S&=&\frac{2\tau_p}{g}\int d^{p}x 
\left(\int dx_1 e^{-\frac{u_1^2}{4}x_1^2}\right)Z(u_1^2)\nonumber \\
&{\displaystyle \mathop{\longrightarrow}^{u_1\rightarrow\infty}}& 
\frac{4\pi \tau_p}{g}\int d^{p}x=\frac{\sqrt{2}\tau_{p-1}}{g}\int d^p x
~~~~~~~~(\mbox{for}~(u_1,u_2)=(\infty,0)).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
S&=&\frac{2\tau_p}{g}\int d^{p-1}x \left(\int dx_1 dx^2 
e^{-\frac{u_1^2}{4}x_1^2-\frac{u_2^2}{4}x_2^2}\right)Z(u_1^2)Z(u_2^2)\nonumber \\
&{\displaystyle \mathop{\longrightarrow}^{u_1,u_2\rightarrow\infty}}& 
\frac{8\pi^2 \tau_p}{g}\int d^{p-1}x=\frac{\tau_{p-2}}{g}\int d^{p-1}x,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
S&=&\frac{\sqrt{2}\tau_p}{g}\int d^{p}x \left(\int dx_1 
e^{-\frac{u_1^2}{4}x_1^2}\right)Z(u_1^2)\nonumber \\
&{\displaystyle \mathop{\longrightarrow}^{u_1\rightarrow\infty}}& 
2\sqrt{2}\pi\frac{\tau_p}{g}\int d^{p}x=\frac{\tau_{p-1}}{g}\int d^p x.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
S&=&\frac{\sqrt{2}\tau_p}{g}\int d^{p}x \left(\int dx_1 
e^{-\frac{u_1^2}{4}x_1^2}\right)
\sqrt{-\det(G_{\mu\nu}-B_{\mu\nu})}Z({\cal G}^{11} u_1^2)\nonumber \\
&{\displaystyle \mathop{\longrightarrow}^{u_1\rightarrow\infty}}& 
\frac{\tau_{p-1}}{g}\int d^{p}x \sqrt{-\det(G_{\mu\nu}-B_{\mu\nu})}
\sqrt{{\cal G}^{11}}\nonumber \\
&=&\frac{\tau_{p-1}}{g}\int d^{p}x 
\sqrt{-\det(G_{\alpha\beta}-B_{\alpha\beta})},
\

\begin{eqnarray}
T \bar{T}(X) &=&
T \bar{T}(x) + \xi^{\mu} (D_\mu (T \bar{T}) )(x)+\cdots
+\frac{1}{4!} \xi^{\sigma} \xi^{\rho} \xi^{\nu} \xi^{\mu} 
(D_{\sigma} D_{\rho} D_{\nu} D_{\mu} (T \bar{T}) )(x)+\cdots,
\nonumber \\
A^{(i)}_{\mu}(X) &=&
A^{(i)}_{\mu} (x) + \xi^{\nu} \partial_\nu A^{(i)}_\mu (x)+\cdots, \hspace{.5cm}
F^{(i)}_{\mu \nu}(X) = 
F^{(i)}_{\mu \nu}(x) + \xi^{\rho} (D_\rho F^{(i)}_{\mu \nu} )(x)+\cdots,
\nonumber\\
D_{\mu} T(X) &=&
D_{\mu} T(x) + \xi^{\nu} (\partial_\nu (D_{\mu} T) )(x)+ 
\frac{1}{2} \xi^{\rho} \xi^{\nu} (\partial_{\rho} \partial_\nu (D_{\mu} T) )(x)+\cdots.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq2} 
|D2,\gamma\rangle^0_{\scriptscriptstyle NSNS}&=&\delta^7(x)
\sum_{(w_{\scriptscriptstyle X}^1,w_{\scriptscriptstyle X}^2)\in{\bf Z}^2}|{\bf w_{\scriptscriptstyle X}},{\bf 0}\rangle,\nonumber \\
|D2,\gamma\rangle^0_{\scriptscriptstyle RR}&=&\delta^7(x)
\sum_{(w_{\scriptscriptstyle X}^1,w_{\scriptscriptstyle X}^2)\in{\bf Z}^2}|{\bf w_{\scriptscriptstyle X}},{\bf 0}\rangle
\otimes|\Omega 2_{\scriptscriptstyle X},\gamma\rangle^0_{\scriptscriptstyle RR}.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
C^i_{\scriptscriptstyle Y}(k^i_{\scriptscriptstyle YL},k^i_{\scriptscriptstyle YR})\equiv\exp\left[\frac{1}{2}\pi i
(k^i_{\scriptscriptstyle YL}-k^i_{\scriptscriptstyle YR})(\hat{p}^i_{\scriptscriptstyle YL}+\hat{p}^i_{\scriptscriptstyle YR})\right].
\

\begin{eqnarray}
Z_{NSNS}(\alpha,\beta)
&\equiv&\langle B(\alpha,\beta)|\Delta|B(\alpha,\beta)\rangle_{\scriptscriptstyle NSNS}\nonumber \\
&=&\frac{(T_2)^2V_3}{2}\int^{\infty}_0 ds (4\pi s)^{-\frac72}
\Biggl[\sum_{(w_{\phi}^ 1,w_{\phi}^2)\in{\bf Z}^2}\Bigl\{\cos^2(\pi\alpha w_{\phi}^1)\cos^2(\pi\beta w_{\phi}^2)\nonumber \\ 
& & \ +\sin^2(\pi\alpha w_{\phi}^1)\sin^2(\pi\beta w_{\phi}^2)\Bigr\}q^{(w_{\phi}^1)^2+
(w_{\phi}^2)^2}\frac{f_3(q)^8}{f_1(q)^8}-2\frac{f_4(q)^6f_3(q)^2}{f_1(q)^6f_2(q)^2}
\Biggl], \nonumber \\
&&\nonumber \\
&&\nonumber \\
Z_{RR}(\alpha,\beta)
&\equiv&\langle B(\alpha,\beta)|\Delta|B(\alpha,\beta)\rangle_{\scriptscriptstyle RR}\nonumber \\
&=&-\frac{(T_2)^2V_3}{2}\int^{\infty}_0 ds (4\pi s)^{-\frac72}
\Biggl[\sum_{(w_{\phi}^1,w_{\phi}^2)\in{\bf Z}^2}\Biggl\{
\cos^2\left(\pi\alpha \left(w_{\phi}^1+\frac12\right)\right)
\cos^2\left(\pi\beta \left(w_{\phi}^2+\frac12\right)\right)\nonumber \\ 
& &\!\! +\sin^2\left(\pi\alpha \left(w_{\phi}^1+\frac12\right)\right)
\sin^2\left(\pi\beta \left(w_{\phi}^2+\frac12\right)\right)
\Biggr\}q^{(w_{\phi}^1+\frac12)^2+(w_{\phi}^2+\frac12)^2}\frac{f_2(q)^8}{f_1(q)^8}
\Biggl],
\

\begin{eqnarray}
Z^{open}_{NS}(\alpha,\beta)
&=&2^{-2}\pi^{-1}V\int^{\infty}_0 dt\ t^{-\frac32}\sum_{(n_1,n_2)
\in{\bf Z}^2}
\Biggl[\frac{1}{2}(\tilde{q}^{n_1^2+n_2^2}+\tilde{q}^{(n_1-\alpha)^2+(n_2-\beta)^2)})\frac{f_3(\tilde{q})^8}{f_1(\tilde{q})^8} \nonumber \\
& & ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-\frac{1}{2}(-1)^{n_1+n_2}(\tilde{q}^{n_1^2+n_2^2}+\tilde{q}^{(n_1-\alpha)^2+(n_2-\beta)^2})\frac{f_4(\tilde{q})^8}{f_1(\tilde{q})^8}\Biggl], \nonumber \\
Z^{open}_{R}(\alpha,\beta)
&=&-2^{-2}\pi^{-1}V\int^{\infty}_0 dt\ t^{-\frac32}\sum_{(n_1,n_2)
\in{\bf Z}^2}
\tilde{q}^{n_1^2+n_2^2}\frac{f_2(\tilde{q})^8}{f_1(\tilde{q})^8} \label{eqn:openamp},
\

=T_2+\sum_i \Delta R_i\times
\langle 0|\psi_L^i(0)\psi_R^i(0)|B(\alpha,\beta)\rangle_{\scriptscriptstyle NSNS}.
